about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Some infomation about me
about.description: As a Front-end Web Developer with hands-on experience in building professional web applications, I have a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern front-end frameworks such as React and Vue.js. I am an active communicator with experience in teamwork and problem-solving skills.

skills.title: My skills

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: The projects that I have completed
projects.qltask: Task management website, which is built based on the Trello use Next.js 14, PostgreSQL and Prisma
projects.easy_food: Graduation project with the participation of 7 team members, focusing on the development of an automated food ordering system named easyFood. The system enables automatic menu selection through QR codes. React + Typescript + Redux Toolkit is employed for the front-end, and PHP (Laravel framework) + MySQL is used for the back-end
